Package com.tangosol.util

Class AbstractScript

java.lang.Object
com.tangosol.util.AbstractScript
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExternalizableLite, PortableObject, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ScriptAggregator, ScriptFilter, ScriptProcessor
public class AbstractScript extends Object implements ExternalizableLite, PortableObject
AbstractScriptBase is the base class for script based processing.
Since:
14.1.1.0
Author:
mk 2019.09.25

    • readExternal

      public void readExternal(DataInput in) throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: ExternalizableLite
      Restore the contents of this object by loading the object's state from the passed DataInput object.
      Specified by:
      readExternal in interface ExternalizableLite
      Parameters:
      in - the DataInput stream to read data from in order to restore the state of this object
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O exception occurs
      NotActiveException - if the object is not in its initial state, and therefore cannot be deserialized into
